Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class LobbyPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Phase
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.LobbyPhase
public class LobbyPhase extends Phase
The LobbyPhase class represents the initial state of the game, in which Players are allowed to join and leave the game's lobby through the addPlayer() and removePlayer() methods. After the last Player joined the lobby, a new PreparePhase is returned.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • usernamePattern

      private static final Pattern usernamePattern
      A regex pattern that matches acceptable usernames. It corresponds to an alpha-numerical username between 1 and 30 characters long.

    • usernameRegexMsg

      private static final String usernameRegexMsg
      A string describing the regex pattern used for validating usernames.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      The game's table.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public Phase addPlayer(String username) throws IllegalArgumentException, InvalidPhaseUpdateException
      This method lets a client join the game. It requires a username, that is from now on identifying the player inside the game. Therefore, it must not be an already chosen username for this game.
      Overrides:
      addPlayer in class Phase
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who wants to join
      Returns:
      a new and changed LobbyPhase instance or a new PreparePhase instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given username is null
      InvalidPhaseUpdateException - if a player with the same username is already taking part in this game

    • pickTowerColor

      private TowerColor pickTowerColor()
      Helper method that returns a TowerColor that has not already been picked by a player.
      Returns:
      a new TowerColor

    • removePlayer

      public Phase removePlayer(String username) throws InvalidPhaseUpdateException
      This method lets a player peacefully disconnect from the game lobby. From now on, the server will no longer keep track of this player.
      Overrides:
      removePlayer in class Phase
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      a new instance of LobbyPhase
      Throws:
      InvalidPhaseUpdateException - if the specified player is not taking part in this game

      Table getTable()
      Getter for this Phase's Table.
      Overrides:

      Returns:
      this Phase's Table.

    • compare

      public PhaseDiff compare(Phase other)
      Calculates a PhaseDiff from this LobbyPhase and the given one. All the entities of the passed Phase are returned into the diff since this Phase does not guarantee that all players could be present.
      Overrides:
      compare in class Phase
      Parameters:
      other - the Phase to compare against
      Returns:
      a new PhaseDiff
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null
